0: The fragile colossus of Krasnoznamenny, had fallen before the invading forces of ATOM
6.287198: Not everyone was pleased with the new leadership, and many old citizens left the city, just to be dissolved by the Wastes… Still, those who stayed, started building civilization with doubled strength
21.76338: However, progress came with a price… For the sake of survival and revival, the military rule of ATOM took most of the freedoms, people of Krasnoznamenny used to enjoy
